name: coffee after death?
description:
short dating sim where you meet the embodiment of death on your way to the afterlife (and maybe take it out for some coffee - all that paperwork gets tiring sometimes, after all.)

features:

  • like 5 to 10 minutes of dialogue
  • 3 (and a half) endings
  • capitalism :/

this was my first project in ren'py which is why it's really basic and short - i was just trying to figure out how everything works lol :) have fun playing.

sprites by me, music by loyalty freak, font by datagoblin!

if you encounter any bugs or spelling errors or anything, let me know!
